directives.name: Data Quality Debt Detection
directives.description: Identify sites accumulating data quality debt — entry lag, query lifecycle, monitoring gaps, visit compliance failures, overdue actions, KRI deterioration, and cross-domain consistency issues threatening database lock readiness.

directives.name: Enrollment Pipeline Health
directives.description: Detect enrollment pipeline failures — velocity declines, funnel bottlenecks by failure reason, consent withdrawals, supply chain risks, randomization delays, regional disparities, and arm balance issues threatening study timeline.

directives.name: Competitive Landscape Shifts
directives.description: Monitor competitive trial landscape — new entries, status changes, geographic overlap with underperforming sites, regulatory signals, and protocol design comparisons affecting enrollment feasibility.

directives.name: Data Integrity Surveillance
directives.description: Centralized statistical monitoring — detect variance suppression, CRA rubber-stamping, temporal pattern anomalies, query lifecycle manipulation, narrative fabrication, correction provenance paradoxes, and cross-domain consistency red flags.

directives.name: At-Risk Site Identification
directives.description: Identify sites requiring rescue or closure — enrollment trajectory viability, multi-domain deterioration, root cause differentiation, supply chain contribution, regional benchmarking, and KRI escalation with rescue-vs-closure recommendation framework.

directives.name: Vendor KPI Degradation
directives.description: Assess vendor operational performance — KPI trend analysis, milestone delivery, issue resolution effectiveness, site-level operational impact, financial cost of vendor delays, and corrective action tracking.

directives.name: Budget Variance & Burn Rate
directives.description: Identify financial risks — budget variance by category/country/vendor, cost-per-patient efficiency, burn rate runway projection, change order scope creep, delay cost quantification, and payment milestone cash flow risks.

directives.name: MVR Pattern Intelligence
directives.description: Analyze MVR narratives for cross-visit recurrence (zombie findings), CRA behavioral patterns (rubber-stamping, quality gaps), PI engagement decline, hidden compliance risks, post-gap monitoring debt, data integrity red flags, and temporal anomalies.
